options.root: The absolute path to the Drupal project root.
options.composer: The path of the Composer PHP script. Don't set this unless you know what you're doing.
options.url: The URL of the Drupal site. Don't set this unless you know what you're doing.
options.timeout: How long to wait for the web server to start before timing out, in seconds.
options.server: Whether to automatically start the web server once Drupal is installed.
options.archive: The path of a .tar.gz archive that contains the pre-built Drupal code base.
options.fixture: The name of a test fixture from which to create the Drupal project.
